title: Current Media
details: Quickly access and increment your in-progress Anime and Manga from anywhere.

title: Search
details: Search for an anime or manga you see while browsing and add it to your current or planning list right from the extension.
Clicking the library_add icon will set the item as current.
Clicking the library_books icon will set the item as planning.

title: Notifications
details: View your notifications without opening the site.
By default, a check for new notifications will be made every minute. The number of notifications will be displayed on the extension badge. This can be changed or disabled in the settings.
There is an opt-in setting for Chrome users that will send a desktop notification when new ones are found.

title: Forum Activity
details: See what's going on on the forum at a glance.
